title: 导致延迟 掉线的问题
author: a13695846790
txt_content:
10:30:37] [Server thread/ERROR]: Index: 2 Listeners:
[10:30:37] [Server thread/ERROR]: 0: NORMAL
[10:30:37] [Server thread/ERROR]: 1: ASM: noppes.npcs.ScriptPlayerEventHandler@57fbb6ec onServerTick(Lnet/minecraftforge/fml/common/gameevent/TickEvent$PlayerTickEvent;)V

replies.author: CABBA
replies.txt_content: TickEvent$PlayerTickEvent   某个世界区块导致的   看看是不是玩家的家里面有卡服的东西   掉线的话应该是网络丢包难以避免顺气自然就行了
